Reviews.Content: returned fantastic weekend madrid hotel located quiet street metro stop couple minutes main tourist attractions mere ten minute walk modern clean city hotel didnt eat hotel breakfast pricey cup coffee pastry found cafes nearby couple euros staff friendly helpful spacious comfortable

Reviews.Title: “quiet location, good hotel”
Reviews.Author: SeeAndalucia
Reviews.Content: location close parks palace plaza espana plazas sleep choice day international flight triple real bed musty smell clean asthma matters teenager liked computer internet access lobby

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: r88my
Reviews.Content: fantastic little hotel modern clean spacious little kitchen hotel 2mins metro station madrid easliy accessable hotel close temple debod 10mins walk royal palace

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Find!!”
Reviews.Author: nubianlaydeetee
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night march 2010 hotel basic – clean colours scheme neutral pictures prints decoration – add bit character minutes walk placa de espana metro – gran via kitchenette idea – crockery kettle etc brought staff friendly helpful – developed leak – relocated 5 minutes – excellent service definitely stay madrid – value money downside school playground located directly front hotel issue staying request rear property disturbed

Reviews.Title: “Clean, convenient, homey”
Reviews.Author: Jeurop
Reviews.Content: loved week madrid sad leaving home home relaxing vacation ive lifetime quiet comfortable perfectly located miss dishes silverware kitchenette iron ironing board thats okay liked sounds children music playing school playground below associate pleasant stay suites vienna charming liked short walking distance metro stations easy access restaurants tapas bars shops atms parks immediate sounds hard believe vending machine sandwich chorizo egg white bread sandwich stay

Reviews.Title: “I wish this chain was i more locations... very happy”
Reviews.Author: ZacharyS
Reviews.Content: staff bit surley comfortable nice baths easy walking distrance restaraunts entertainment subway didnt understand stove top dont provide pots pans stay madrid

Reviews.Title: “perfect location, good room”
Reviews.Author: ottawanian
Reviews.Content: madrid 5 day trip incl toledo spent close month looking affordable centrally located hotel hotel clean spacious little kitchen stove cook bathroom little fancy staff friendly absolutely perfect location major attractions 15 min walk metro 5 min walk lots restaurants close main shopping district walking distance didnt try breakfast alot toast muffins coffee ets 10 euros found little retaurant close churros breakfast 3 euros

Reviews.Title: “Suites Viena is Clean, Extremely Customer Friendly , and Great Location”
Reviews.Author: psgeorockclimber
Reviews.Content: night stay target hotel run clean bigger normal quiet breakfast looks appointed spend location perfect touring jogging bearings hotel short blocks plaza de espana ventura metro stops light food supplies cafes block couple streets depending tastes budget temple de debod egyptian temple moved piece piece 1968 continuous parks truly amazing morning runningwalking evening strolls staff answered question enthusiasm real desire serve requested nice credit card usd euros credit card doesnt charge 3 various hotels submit usd amounts versus foreign currencies hotel rating recommended hotel friends
